about_the_game:
Looking for a game that will let you live out your law enforcement fantasies? Look no further than Cop Simulator! In this game, you can play as a police officer, investigating crimes and bringing criminals to justice. Cop Simulator is the perfect game for anyone who wants to experience what it's like to be a cop, without any of the real-world consequences. So come on, put on your badge and get ready to fight crime!

The game will also feature a large open world, and players will be able to explore it freely. There will be plenty of side missions and activities to keep players busy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or Newer(64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i5 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2 GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7 or Newer(64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i7 3.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 4 GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Cop Simulator will let you take on the role of a police officer, and you will have to deal with all the challenges that come with the job. From responding to emergencies, to investigating crimes, to making arrests, you will have to do it all.
